definitions.definition: to close one eye for a short time as a way of greeting someone or showing friendliness, sexual interest, etc., or of showing that you are not serious about something you have said:
examples: Laura winked at me as Stephen turned his back.

definitions.definition: When lights wink, they keep flashing on and off quickly:
examples: Reflected in the water, the lights winked at us from the other side of the lake.

definitions.definition: the action of winking at someone:
examples: He gave me a conspiratorial wink as they left the room.
